name: LONG BOI
description:
Longboi's time has come, with his last strength he runs from the Grim Reaper and the end of his time.

Your time is running out, eat as many time pills as you can without dying. Watch out for spiders and obstacles.

CONTROLS:

  • When played in browser: Click the "start" button with your mouse to start the game. Pess the "A" button with your mouse to jump up and down.

NOTE:

  • for better experience, download the file and use an emulator
  • music and sound could not be implemented due to memory problems and lack of time
  • if the game does not work in browser, try reloading the page
